> <OLD>
>
> WHEELIE stood his ground.  Glancing up at the DINOBOT COMMANDER, and the
> numerous other DINOSAURS who were following him.  "I am Wheelie, and so I
> said, I would be your friend until we both were dead."
>
> His arms crossed inf ront of him and his energon slingshot holstered at his
> flank, "I was you friend when I was small, you saved me while you were still
> tall.  I remember when we met, and I said I would owe you a debt.  While we
> were on the planet of Quintesson, fighting off the wild Sharkticon."
>
> Glancing up at the seemingly rage imbued GRIMLOCK, WHEELIE continued, afraid
> fo what had happened, "To what happened ot you, I do not know, all I fear is
> your tale of woe.  I am sorry, for what was begot, that at your side as I
> said I would be, I was not.  For if hate was inflicted upon you, for which I
> would quake..  Then I will pay the penance for what was inflicted uponyou,
> if eased your spark you would be then be make."

GRIMLOCK paused as he looked at WHEELIE a certain level of recognition
appearing in his optics for a moment. "Wheelie?" He said as he tilted
his head at the AUTOBOT who was less than half his size.

Behind GRIMLOCK the roars of the approaching DINOBOTS were coming
closer and with that sound GRIMLOCK's optics once again started to
darken. "Wheelie Friend!" he bellowed loudly as if trying to command
himself to remember that, but it was obvious that GRIMLOCK was loosing
some internal battle.

GRIMLOCK raised his head roared at the skies in frustration and anger,
the sound of it echoing across the landscape. However the optics that
GRIMLOCK turned back on WHEELIE were not the ones of a friend, they
were ones of a raging monster!

GRIMLOCK roared again as he stepped towards WHEELIE his jaws opened wide!

(TAG)

- Preston
